reviewed
1 hour ago
packages/agent/src/client/connect.ts
65
+ const blobStore = new InMemoryBlobStore();
cursor
bot
1 hour ago
Bug: Global Blob Store Causes Data Leakage
The blobStore is declared as a global module-level constant, making it shared across all AgentConnectClient instances. This causes data leakage, as in-memory blob data from one client session or conversation can be accessed by others.
Fix in Cursor
Fix in Web
